mapper.select: SELECT * FROM ( SELECT A.* , B.UI_ID REGNM , C.UI_ID MODNM FROM T_MENU_VIEW_DATA A LEFT JOIN T_USERINFO B ON A.MVD_REGNM = B.UI_KEYNO LEFT JOIN T_USERINFO C ON A.MVD_MODNM = C.UI_KEYNO WHERE 1=1 AND MVD_KEYNO = #{MVD_KEYNO} AND MVD_DEL_YN = 'N' ) WHERE ROWNUM = 1

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT A.* , B.UI_ID REGNM , C.UI_ID MODNM FROM T_MENU_VIEW_DATA A LEFT JOIN T_USERINFO B ON A.MVD_REGNM = B.UI_KEYNO LEFT JOIN T_USERINFO C ON A.MVD_MODNM = C.UI_KEYNO WHERE 1=1 AND MVD_KEYNO = #{MVD_KEYNO} AND MVD_DEL_YN = 'N' ) WHERE ROWNUM = 1

SELECT 'MENU_'||LTRIM(SUBSTR(MN_KEYNO,INSTR(MN_KEYNO,'_',1)+1),'0') VIEWNAME , SUBSTR(SUBSTR(MN_URL,2),0,INSTR(SUBSTR(MN_URL,2),'/')-1) TILES , (SELECT MN_NAME FROM T_MENU_MANAGER WHERE MN_KEYNO = MVD.MVD_MN_KEYNO) MN_NAME , MVD.MVD_DATA VIEW_DATA FROM T_MENU_VIEW_DATA MVD LEFT JOIN T_MENU_MANAGER MN ON MVD.MVD_MN_KEYNO = MN.MN_KEYNO WHERE MVD_DEL_YN = 'N' AND MVD_MN_KEYNO = (SELECT MN_KEYNO FROM T_MENU_MANAGER WHERE MN_URL = #{MN_URL} AND MN_DEL_YN = 'N' AND MN_USE_YN = 'Y' )

SELECT (SELECT MN_NAME FROM T_MENU_MANAGER WHERE MN_KEYNO = MVD.MVD_MN_KEYNO) MN_NAME , (SELECT MN_URL FROM T_MENU_MANAGER WHERE MN_KEYNO = MVD.MVD_MN_KEYNO) MN_URL , MVH.MVH_DATA MVD_DATA FROM T_MENU_VIEW_DATA_HISTORY MVH LEFT JOIN T_MENU_VIEW_DATA MVD ON MVH.MVH_MVD_KEYNO = MVD.MVD_KEYNO WHERE MVH_KEYNO = #{MVH_KEYNO}
mapper.insert: MERGE INTO T_MENU_VIEW_DATA MVD USING (SELECT #{MVD_KEYNO} AS MVD_KEYNO , #{MVD_MN_KEYNO} AS MVD_MN_KEYNO , #{MVD_MN_HOMEDIV_C} AS MVD_MN_HOMEDIV_C , #{MVD_DATA} AS MVD_DATA , #{MVD_REGDT} AS MVD_REGDT , #{MVD_REGNM} AS MVD_REGNM FROM DUAL ) TEMP ON (MVD.MVD_KEYNO = TEMP.MVD_KEYNO) WHEN MATCHED THEN UPDATE SET MVD_DATA = #{MVD_DATA}, MVD_MODDT = SYSDATE, MVD_MODNM = #{MVD_MODDT} WHEN NOT MATCHED THEN INSERT ( MVD_KEYNO, MVD_MN_KEYNO, MVD_MN_HOMEDIV_C, MVD_DATA, MVD_REGDT, MVD_REGNM ) VALUES ( #{MVD_KEYNO}, #{MVD_MN_KEYNO}, #{MVD_MN_HOMEDIV_C}, #{MVD_DATA}, SYSDATE, #{MVD_REGNM} )

INSERT INTO T_MENU_VIEW_DATA( MVD_KEYNO, MVD_MN_KEYNO, MVD_MN_HOMEDIV_C, MVD_DATA, MVD_REGDT, MVD_REGNM, MVD_EDITOR_TYPE ) VALUES ( #{MVD_KEYNO}, #{MVD_MN_KEYNO}, #{MVD_MN_HOMEDIV_C}, #{MVD_DATA}, SYSDATE, #{MVD_REGNM}, #{MVD_EDITOR_TYPE} )
UPDATE T_MENU_VIEW_DATA SET MVD_DATA = #{MVD_DATA}, MVD_MODDT = SYSDATE, MVD_MODNM = #{MVD_MODDT}, MVD_EDITOR_TYPE = #{MVD_EDITOR_TYPE} WHERE MVD_KEYNO = #{MVD_KEYNO}

INSERT INTO T_MENU_VIEW_DATA_HISTORY( MVH_KEYNO, MVH_MVD_KEYNO, MVH_DATA, MVH_STDT, MVH_ENDT, MVH_MODNM, MVH_VERSION, MVH_COMMENT ) VALUES( #{MVH_KEYNO}, #{MVH_MVD_KEYNO}, #{MVH_DATA}, TO_DATE(#{MVH_STDT},'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS'), SYSDATE, #{MVH_MODNM}, #{MVH_VERSION}, #{MVH_COMMENT} )
mapper.select: SELECT A.* , B.UI_ID MVD_MODNM FROM T_MENU_VIEW_DATA_HISTORY A LEFT JOIN T_USERINFO B ON A.MVH_MODNM = B.UI_KEYNO WHERE MVH_MVD_KEYNO = #{MVD_KEYNO} AND MVH_DEL_YN = 'N' ORDER BY MVH_STDT DESC
